subject: Re: [junit] HttpUnit Books
msgSnippet: ... Well, nobody has asked me to write HttpUnit in Action yet... :) There are a number of books listed on the HttpUnit site which devote single chapters to
messageBody:
On Fri, 12 Nov 2004 12:51:21 -0000, thecyriuz82 <thecyriuz82@...> wrote:
> I have a question concerning HttpUnit. I have to write my Diploma and
> to use HttpUnit in it. So my question: Are there any books or workouts
> which describes HttpUnit?
> Unfortunately I found not very much about HttpUnit.

Well, nobody has asked me to write "HttpUnit in Action" yet... :)

There are a number of books listed on the HttpUnit site which devote
single chapters to the basics of the library, and there is a tutorial
which also covers some interesting scenarios. Why don't you try using
it and let me know if you have any specific questions.
